formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'IF' =-
[Syntax] IF(<expr>?[<true>][:<false>])
[Synopsis] Conditional: Returns the data following '?' if true else the data following ':'
[Description] Not available

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ IF(<expr>?[<true>][:<false>])
[Synopsis] - Conditional: Returns the data following '?' if true else the data following ':' + Conditional: Returns the data following '?' if true, else the data following ':'
[Description] Not available
